Title: U.S. can avoid lockdowns if coronavirus returns: Fauci - Reuters India
Description: The United States will likely see another cycle of the coronavirus sometime after the current outbreak has ended, but entire cities will not be need to be closed down again because of what is being learned now, the government's top infectious diseases expert …

Title: Coronavirus impact: How did Modi govt arrive at 21-day lockdown period and not 14 - International Business Times, India Edition
Description: There is scientific evidence and epidemiological significance to reason out why the Modi government imposed a national lockdown period of 21-days and not lesser than 21.

Title: Can one have immunith against coronavirus? Antibody tests raise hope - The New Indian Express
Description: Immunity may bring an early treatment to coronavirus as antibodies gathered from the bodies of those who have recovered may be used to help those struggling with the diseasae.

Title: ICMR answers Covid-19 related queries for people with hypertension, diabetes, heart diseases - ThePrint
Description: ICMR, the country apex medical research body, has answered a list of FAQs on the novel coronavirus that infected more than 600 in India.

Title: Coronavirus pandemic: Foreigner treated with HIV drugs for Covid-19 tests negative - India Today
Description: A British national, who had earlier tested positive for Covid-19, responded well to the drugs combination of Ritonavir and Lopinavir (HIV antiretroviral drugs), and his latest test results showed he has tested negative for the virus, a hospital statement said.
